overview: A buffalo herd of over 1,200 is forced to move through three lion territories while being confined by the flood waters on a small island in the Okavango. As the buffalo strategize their advancements, the lions react to each and every move they make. From the Joubertâ€™s home base in Botswana, comes the epic story of buffalo and lions surviving and adapting to each other.
title: Relentless Enemies: Revealed
